thread.title: Waterloo -
thread.title_full: Waterloo - Review of Premier Inn London Waterloo (Westminster Bridge) Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: pugwash3
title: Waterloo -
text: Easy to find, well situated for exploring London. Very easy access to rail, tube and bus and very close to the Thames if you would rather travel by boat. It is well sound proofed and quiet and we did not experience 'corridor noise'. Our only criticism would be the price of the evening meal ... we ate out in central London for less.
